thread.title: RFC (Hollis, NH)
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by RFC (Hollis, NH)

author: RFC (Hollis, NH)
title: RFC (Hollis, NH)
text: Friendly courteous staff; most helpful - they know their tires! ... and they're fairly priced. Wound probably have given them 5 stars except the wait time seemed excessively long ( not enough technicians in the work bays?)
